arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs PSG – The Parisian squad: 2 major returns
arts.sum: This Tuesday (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET), first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face eighth-place Bayer Leverkusen at the BayArena for Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. Here is the squad selected by Parisian coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Beraldo, Hakimi, Hernandez, Marquinhos, Mendes, Pacho, Zabarnyi. Midfielders – Lee, Mayulu, Ndjantou, […]

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs PSG – Huge announcements about the Parisian group!
arts.sum: This Tuesday, first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face eighth-place Bayer Leverkusen at the BayArena in Matchday 3 of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 p.m. CET). This Monday, RMC Sport announced two major returns to the Paris squad, but also two long-term absences. “Ballon d’Or winner Ousmane Dembélé and PSG captain Marquinhos are back in […]

arts.ttl: Ousmane Dembélé to return to PSG squad for Champions League tie
arts.sum: Ousmane Dembélé (28) is set to make a long-awaited return to the Paris Saint-Germain squad this week, as per a report from Le Parisien.
